name: VSoft
overview:
VSoft Corporation provides banking and payment solutions to financial institutions. It offers check processing solutions, including branch capture, merchant capture, Agile Home/Office, gateway, image item processing, image exchange, research, risk mitigation, statements and delivery, returns, and adjustments.

VSoft also provides remittance processing solutions for wholetail (retail and non-complex wholesale) and wholesale payments, such as Centrum Payments wholetail, a remittance processing system with extractions, images, and ACH transmissions; and Centrum Payments wholesale, an application to process wholesale lockbox payments. In addition, it offers Centrum Documents solutions, including Centrum Documents Imaging application to scan, index, and archive information from loan and deposit documents, and signature cards; and Centrum Documents COLD, a report management and distribution solution with Internet and intranet access.

Further, the company provides VSoft Managed Services, including Straight Through Image Processing Services and Core Data Processing Services for item and data processing. Its services include project management, solution implementation, and training. The companyâ€™s customers include banks, credit unions, savings institutions, transaction processors, governments, utilities, telecommunications, collections agencies, and retail organizations. It provides its solutions through associates in the United States and India.

VSoft Corporation was founded in 1996 and is based in Duluth, Georgia.
